name: Carsactive
overview: Carsactive is an internet based multi-purpose portal designed to allow consumers control over all major aspects associated with buying, selling, operating and maintaining their vehicle. It also gives car related service providers the ability to target new customers and stay connected with existing ones. Carsactive utilizes concepts similar to Zillow, LinkedIn, Groupon, Angies List and Priceline to provide all the tools necessary to make the most of the car ownership experience. To accomplish these goals, Carsactive provides the following functionalities… Creation of car profiles to track car value, service records, warranties, recalls, history and condition. Creation of Driver profile to engage in message forums, research car information, sell cars and buy cars. Creation of Service Provider profiles to keep in touch with existing customers, target new customers, create discount offerings and schedule special events. Carsactive launched in a lean startup pattern, has a launched product, highly researched strategy and a team with over 80 years of software business and 40 years of automotive industry experience.
